item.title: Pi-hole: Network-wide Ad Blocking
item.description: Pi-hole is a Linux network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application which acts as a DNS sinkhole, and optionally a DHCP server, for a private network. It is designed to protect your devices from unwanted content like ads, trackers, and malicious websites across your entire network, improving privacy and browsing speed.
